text:
Public Health (Exemption) Order 2001

I make the following order under section 187 of the Public Health Act 1997 .

21 February 2001

M. JACOBS

Director of Public Health

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Public Health (Exemption) Order 2001 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order â€“
        Act means the Public Health Act 1997 .

4. Exemption
    A person is exempt from section 133(1) of the Act in relation to the use of a private water source on food premises registered under the Food Act 2003 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 7 March 2001

This order is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
